name: Witching Hour (itch) (jlothamer, JDYMusic, ilikethepixies, Franklinopolus, MATRIX369)
name_original: Witching Hour (itch) (jlothamer, JDYMusic, ilikethepixies, Franklinopolus, MATRIX369)
description:
Take control of the witch and her minions to create a potion to rid the swamplands of the clamoring Undead before they overrun your Cabin!

Your minions can help you refine your brew and repair your cabin while the witch uses her crystal ball and mana pool to defend it! Use her spellbook to empower your minions so they can help defend the cabin and complete the brew more quickly!

Be sure to use the crystal ball to place your runic wards to turn back the Undead, or you'll quickly be overrun!  Use the spellbook as well to increase the rate of your minion's work and give them the ability to interact with the mana pool.

See in-game how-to-play page and for adjustable keybindings!

NOTE:  You will need a dedicated graphics card for this game.  Integrated GPU's are not likely to be able to run this game at a reasonable framerate.
